title: How to use thunderbird with comcast
content: Is it possible to use Mozilla Thunderbird to access comcast emails? I have spent a couple of days attempting to make this work, but after I enter my information and it is OK'd, I get the "Access Denied" message. Any help here? No one from Mozilla or Comcast has any answers.
creator: johnfkenney

title: Installed thunderbird but can't set up my email account cause can't connet to the server
content: I just installed thunderbird and I try to set up my email but it doesn't work. It says: unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password. But all my credits are corrects. Plz help me
creator: geb997

title: verbinding met server
content: Binnen 2 minuten krijg ik de melding "wachttijd voor verbinding met server imap kpnmail is verlopen of wachttijd voor verbinding met server imap hostnet is verlopen" en dan kan ik geen mail meer versturen of ontvangen. Hoe los ik dit probleem op?
creator: s.hontele
